title: The required segregating distance between Industrial Zone and the area over which Residential use is permitted under this regulation, shall be provided within such land intended to be used for residential or commercial purpose
clause_text: The required segregating distance between Industrial Zone and the area over which Residential use is permitted under this regulation, shall be provided within such land intended to be used for residential or commercial purpose. In case of adjoining area is developed and obnoxious industry is existing on such part, then necessary segregation distance shall be provided. However, if non-obnoxious user is existing on such part, no such segregation distance shall be provided.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
